fr.sii.ogham.spring.autoconfigure

Class OghamAutoConfiguration.DefaultConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.spring.autoconfigure.OghamAutoConfiguration.DefaultConfiguration
  • Enclosing class:
    OghamAutoConfiguration

    @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnMissingClass(name="org.thymeleaf.spring4.SpringTemplateEngine")
public static class OghamAutoConfiguration.DefaultConfiguration
extends Object

    This configuration is used when the SpringTemplateEngine is not available in the classpath.

    It creates a MessagingService bean from Spring Environment. It uses the default TemplateEngine.

    The MessagingService is configured to use all default behaviors. See MessagingBuilder.useAllDefaults() for more information about default behaviors.

    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
